title: Real-Time Facebook Ads Data
description: Automatically pull live Facebook Ads data directly into Google Sheets. Monitor campaign performance, ad spend, and conversions in real-time.

title: Customizable Data Views
description: Create personalized spreadsheet dashboards tailored to your reporting needs. Focus on the metrics that matter most for your campaigns.

title: AI-Powered Insights
description: Get intelligent campaign analysis and recommendations powered by AI. Discover optimization opportunities and actionable insights automatically.

title: Facebook Ads API Integration
description: Seamlessly connect to Facebook Marketing API to access all your ad account data. Pull campaigns, ad sets, and ad-level metrics effortlessly.

title: Google Sheets Native Extension
description: Work directly within Google Sheets with our native extension. No need to switch between platforms - everything syncs automatically.

title: Dedicated Support
description: Get expert assistance from our team who understands Facebook Ads and Google Sheets. We're here to help you maximize your ad performance.

title: Scalable Data Pulling
description: Whether you manage one ad account or hundreds, our extension scales with your needs. Handle unlimited campaigns and data volumes efficiently.

title: Automated Data Refresh
description: Schedule automatic data refreshes to keep your sheets updated. Set intervals from hourly to daily based on your reporting requirements.

title: Advanced Performance Reports
description: Generate comprehensive Facebook Ads reports with customizable metrics. Track ROAS, CTR, CPC, conversions, and all key performance indicators.

title: Team Collaboration
description: Share your Facebook Ads data sheets with team members seamlessly. Collaborate on campaign analysis and strategy with shared access.

title: Multi-Account Management
description: Connect and manage multiple Facebook Ad accounts from a single extension. Switch between accounts and consolidate reporting effortlessly.

title: Custom Metric Formulas
description: Create custom calculated metrics using Google Sheets formulas. Combine Facebook Ads data with your own business metrics for deeper insights.

title: Performance Alerts
description: Set up alerts for campaign performance thresholds. Get notified when spend exceeds budget or when ROAS drops below targets.

title: API Rate Limit Optimization
description: Intelligent API call management ensures efficient data retrieval without hitting Facebook's rate limits. Get all your data without interruptions.

title: Historical Data Export
description: Pull historical Facebook Ads performance data for trend analysis. Access data from any date range to track long-term campaign performance.

title: Campaign Comparison Tools
description: Compare performance across campaigns, ad sets, and individual ads side-by-side. Identify top performers and underperforming elements quickly.

title: Interactive Setup Wizard
description: Get started quickly with our step-by-step setup guide. Connect your Facebook Ads account and pull your first report in minutes.

title: Custom Data Filters
description: Filter Facebook Ads data by campaign objective, status, date range, and custom parameters. Focus on exactly the data you need to analyze.

title: Visual Performance Charts
description: Create stunning visualizations of your Facebook Ads data directly in Google Sheets. Generate charts and graphs with one click.

title: AI Campaign Recommendations
description: Receive AI-generated suggestions for campaign optimization. Get budget allocation recommendations, audience insights, and creative tips.

title: Data Export Options
description: Export your Facebook Ads data and analysis to CSV, PDF, or other formats. Share reports with clients and stakeholders easily.

title: Onboarding Tutorials
description: Access video tutorials and guides to master the extension. Learn best practices for Facebook Ads reporting and AI-powered analysis.

title: Knowledge Base
description: Browse our comprehensive documentation covering setup, troubleshooting, and advanced features. Find answers to Facebook Ads API and Google Sheets questions.

title: Live Chat Support
description: Connect with our support team for immediate help with data syncing issues or analysis questions. Get expert guidance in real-time.

title: Customizable Templates
description: Start with pre-built Facebook Ads report templates or create your own. Save time with ready-made dashboards for common use cases.

title: Attribution Window Settings
description: Configure attribution windows (1-day, 7-day, 28-day) to match your reporting needs. Analyze conversions based on your preferred timeframe.

title: Breakdown Dimensions
description: Break down ad performance by age, gender, placement, device, and more. Understand which audience segments drive the best results.

title: Ad Creative Preview
description: View ad creative thumbnails and copy directly within your sheets. Connect performance metrics with actual ad content for better analysis.

title: Budget Pacing Tracker
description: Monitor campaign budget pacing and spending velocity. Ensure your campaigns spend efficiently without exhausting budgets too quickly.
